nodes.text: A thesselbeast's foot was an item that was believed to bring good luck to its possessor. The smuggler Roark Garnet was one individual who carried one about his person.

The thesselbeast's foot was mentioned in 1987, in the roleplaying adventure "Regina Cayli", first published in West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The adventure was reprinted in the first issue of the Star Wars Adventure Journal in 1994.
